text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The impeached POTUS has ignored Covid-19 warnings, called it a hoax, said it’ll disappear, suggested injecting bleach & taking Hydroxychloroquine.

He has never led a response to this virus that left 90K Americans dead, of which thousands were avoidable.  https://t.co/P1Da7QaqDN
